attributes.action: Introduce equality for men in rape cases.  Under current law, the man's name is made public, whilst the female accuser's name is protected and not made public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have not been in this situation myself, but it does seem unfair that the accused male's name is made public which could have a devastating effect on their life, marriage, work etc..., whilst the female is protected by the law.
Either both names are made public, or possibly better still, both names are withheld, due to the seriousness of the subject.
There is no equality before the law, under the current law. Especially if the man is ultimately found innocent by the court.
Its time for equality for both men and women, where rape is alleged.
